HOW TO MEAL PREP SALMON You can very easily learn how to meal prep salmon, I promise. First, you need to decide on the best way to cook salmon for meal prep. Because salmon can come in all shapes and sizes, I like to but my own large, skinned fillet and then divide it into 4-6 oz. portions. That way, I know the exact size of the salmon portions AND I save money of having the grocery store pre-slice it. The big trick with meal prepping salmon is (1) the spice rub, and (2) pan-roasting. Seriously. Follow this easy salmon recipe and you’ll be head over heals when reheating your salmon.
